author: lgo
msg: Export functions with capital letters in .def file on Windows.
Patch by: Alexander Thomas
* build/gen_def.py
(_funcs): Update regular expression to match capital letters.

author: ivan
msg: Optimize headers buckets.
* buckets/headers_buckets.c
(headers_context_t): Add LAST member to hold pointer to last header.
(serf_bucket_headers_create): Initialize LAST to NULL.
(serf_bucket_headers_setx): Use stored pointer to list tail instead of
iterating every time.

author: lgo
msg: Update r2147's not working approach to get serf_response read more than one
response from a file. Uses the newly added serf_mmap_peek function.
* test/serf_response.c
(main): Peek the file bucket (mmap if available) to check for remaining
data and if there is, try to read another response.

author: lgo
msg: * buckets/mmap_buckets.c
(serf_mmap_peek): Implement.

author: lgo
msg: Enable serf_response to read multiple responses from one file.
* test/serf_response.c
(accept_response): Reuse the remainder of the file for other responses.
(handle_response): Don't abort in case of error.
(main): Loop over accept_response/handle_response until APR_EOF.
